sentences.en: ...his predilection for fast cars and fast horses.
ConclusionMacular CWZ could be a predilection site of CNV in exudative AMD.
sentences.cn: 结论　黄斑区CWZ可能是渗出型AMD的CNV好发部位.

sentences.en: Condylar neck is one of the most predilection sites of mandibular fractures.
sentences.cn: 髁突颈部是下颌骨骨折的好发部位之一.

sentences.en: He has a predilection for rich food.
It'seems a predilection for young adults, as did its notorious ancestor, the 1918 Spanish influenza.
sentences.cn: 就像猪流感臭名昭著的祖先之一, 1918年的那场西班牙流感一样,猪流感更容易光顾年轻人.

sentences.en: Predilection towards children is conniving them, which is adverse for their growth.
sentences.cn: 回护孩子等于纵容孩子, 这样做不利于孩子的成长.

sentences.en: Thanks for the God's predilection, I am slender and have a genius of music.
sentences.cn: 感谢上帝对我的偏爱, 让我拥有苗条的身材和与生俱来的音乐天分.

sentences.en: This would explain my predilection for rapini, since my mother serves it every Thanksgiving.
sentences.cn: 这也许能解释为何我会对迷迭香情有独衷, 这是因为我妈妈在每个感恩节都会做这道菜.

trans.tran_en: if you have a predilection for something, especially something unusual, you like it very much
